params.taskId: The ID of the task to accept

returns.amount: The amount of TSK locked as payment
returns.descriptionCID: The CID of the task description

params.amount: How many TSK you're offering Rob if he accepts
params.descriptionCID: IPFS (or Arweave) CID pointing to full task details

acceptTask(uint256).notice: Rob calls this to accept a proposed task. Escrowed TSK flows immediately.

cancelTask(uint256).notice: Cancel a task you previously proposed (if Rob hasn't accepted yet)

proposeTask(string,uint256).notice: Propose a new task. You must hold ≥ MIN_TSK in your wallet.
